description: This file defines a React functional component named Navbar that renders the top navigation bar of an e-commerce platform. It manages user authentication status, user greetings, shopping cart toggle, and navigation links.

methods.name: Navbar({ onToggleCart })
methods.description: React functional component for rendering the website's navigation bar with user and cart functionalities.

methods.name: handleLogout
methods.description: Handles user logout and redirects to the login page.
